alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:12PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rankin County through 145 PM CDT... At 111 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pelahatchie, or near Brandon, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brandon around 135 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
